title: [GAMEPLAY] FIzz - E Stops Working Randomly

embed.description: Tinypic™ is a photo and video sharing service that allows you to easily upload, link and share your images and videos on MySpace®, eBay®, blogs and message boards. No account required, upload your photos and videos today!

body:
This has happened to me roughly 5 times in the last 3 months but they've been spread, so I can't figure out any common bonds. 

Basically I'll go into a fight with QW and try to escape with E but my E doesn't work. The first couple times I thought I was lagging or something was going on I didn't know about but the last few times I've noticed my E becomes inactive for a long period of time. 

I'm not sure what brings it back but about after around a minute or two of no E, I can cast it again. 

I've included a screenshot from the last game. I dove a Teemo and Annie (Fiddle joined the fight) and I was stunned and then maybe blinded and/or feared, and after all that I still couldn't E and died to the tower. 

When I resurrected my E was still a little darker in color than the rest of my spells and when I clicked to use it, it read "You cannot cast that right now." 

I ran around for a little while and eventually noticed it was back up. If I had to guess I would say it's time based or you need to Q a minion or something.

I'm sorry I can't be more helpful.

Here is the link to the game: http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1757704201/207307297?tab=overview

replies.body:
Just happened again:

Fighting a Cass and Kalysta, attaked the Kalysta, was holding my E cause my team was almost there, killed the Kalysta, and went for Cass but when I tried to E... nothing. I really have no idea what's causing this.

I was thinking about when I see it trying to log in on another comp and watch it and video tape it. But when I went to do it my other comp didn't have the updates. Sad face.

It just happened to me again:

Yi was taking Baron, he got bubbled by Nami, a Mao went in on him, I Q'ed him but he died before it went off (like not before it hit him, before it even went off, before I got in range to activate it) then next thing I know I'm chasing a Syndra and Graves, I ult the Syndra, try to E, look down and its happening again. 

I tried to go to OP.gg and record but it was 40 mins into the game so I couldn't. I don't think it's caused (at least not solely) by Q'ing someone and then they die, but I can't remember anything else distinct that happened in that fight. 

I think I ulted Syndra, she slowed me or whatever she does, maybe Graves dropped his sprinkler thing so that could again be my original theory of getting multiple CC effects at once or something. God this is frustrating. 

But I did check the Q something method Wittrock (and I) mentioned and it worked again.

Please someone else chime in so we can get more info.
THIS JUST HAPPENED TO ME IN A FUCKING RANKED GAME SMH I LOST BECAUSE I COULDNT USE IT FOR 10 MINUTES>( I WAS CARRYING THE FUCKING GAME AISHDJLAKSDJLAKSJDLKASJDLKASJLDKJASLKDJALSKDJLASKJDLASKDJ ANGER
Can you recall what happened when it started? Sorry just seeing this. I'd love to get this fixed tho.

Heyo! 

I've been jamming some Fizz lately, and encountered the same bug once, a couple of weeks ago. Went away when I Q'd a minion.

Tried for a quite to reproduce it, but alas, haven't figured out the cause.

I'll poke a developer about it, but it'll help a massive ton if yourself, or anyone else who can chime into this thread, can reproduce this issue consistently and share the steps to do so!

Hey hey,

I think the first time it happened I was in lane just 1v1, so while I wanna say its a combo of being feared/silenced when you're stunned I don't think that's it. 

I'll try to reproduce it. Maybe it has to do with hitting E right when you get feared/silenced.
